name: voltagent
description: Backend framework with a monorepo structure using pnpm

scripts.build:all: pnpm --filter @voltagent/core run build && pnpm -r --filter @voltagent/* --filter !@voltagent/core run build
scripts.clean: pnpm -r run clean && pnpm -r exec rm -rf node_modules && rimraf node_modules
scripts.coffee: pnpm nuke && pnpm i && pnpm build:all
scripts.nuke: echo 'Removing all node_modules, builds and lockfiles' && pnpm nuke:node_modules && pnpm nuke:builds && pnpm nuke:lockfiles
scripts.nuke:builds: pnpm -r exec rimraf dist && pnpm -r exec rimraf build
scripts.nuke:lockfiles: pnpm -r exec rimraf package-lock.json && pnpm -r exec rimraf yarn.lock && pnpm -r exec rimraf pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.version-packages: changeset version && pnpm i --ignore-scripts --lockfile-only --no-frozen-lockfile && git add pnpm-lock.yaml
